front.title: Gakutensoku
front.subtitle: Japanese robot and first robot in Asia

back.text: Gakutensoku, the first robot to be built in the East, was created in Osaka in the late 1920s. The robot was designed and manufactured by biologist Makoto Nishimura. Nishimura had served as a professor at Hokkaido Imperial University, studied Marimo and was an editorial adviser to the Osaka Mainichi newspaper.
